commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hey, where's Setsuna? I needed to talk to her about the dance steps.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? She was just here a little while ago.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This is just like last time. Rina-chan Board says, "Ding ding ding."

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Right. It's just like what happened after the student council election.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: So that means she's on the rooftop again?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Well, we do have a show tomorrow. Maybe she's nervous.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. Plus, her parents are going to see her perform for the first time. She must be nervous.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?! Her parents are coming?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! Although, she's pretty worried about whether they will actually come or not.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Let's go look for her then. We can cheer her up.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I don't know about that. Prez, would you go for us?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Yeah. You were the one who convinced her to go back home.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Got it. I'll go check. Make sure you all end practice early today and rest so you can be ready for tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Sure thing!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Sigh* I can't focus like usual. What should I do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, there you are! You worry me when you disappear all of a sudden like that.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: S-Sorry! I was a little nervous, so I came here to calm down.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No need to apologize. Everyone was just worried about you, that's all.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Oh, I worried the others too? I've just got so many things swirling around in my head...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Like what?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What if my parents don't show up tomorrow? What if I don't perform well? What if they see me on stage and still think I should quit being a school idol?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And the thing I'm most worried about... I asked my parents to come here so I could show them how I feel, but I have no idea how to even do that.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, it's okay. All you have to do is be your usual self and everything will be fine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I told you before, remember? I think your best feature is that you can convey your feelings to people.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Even when your parents aren't there, you stand on that stage and you show your love to all your fans. You spread love!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I spread love, huh? Yeah... Yeah, you're right!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I just need to be myself. I love being a school idol and I love school idol fans. That's what started this!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Exactly. Now, why don't we go home? Tomorrow's a big day and you need your rest.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Um, there's someplace I wanted to go first. Would you come with me?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is this...the venue for tomorrow's show? This is where you wanted to go?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yeah. Before I perform in front of everyone tomorrow, I want you to see who I am right now. Can we do a show now? Just the two of us?

commands.select_args: ||I really think you should rest up for tomorrow.|| select_1
||Just the two of us? What a treat!|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?! Don't you think you should rest up for tomorrow?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Please. I want you to see it first.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A show with just the two of us? What a treat!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I want you to see if I can convey my feelings through my performance.
